high_schools.text: At least one high school within a 20-minute walk

primary_schools.text: At least one elementary school within a 10-minute walk

transit_friendly.text: Near a subway and frequent bus lines

wellness.text: A variety of amenities within a few minutes' walk that cater to physical activity and healthy eating

restaurants.text: Variety of restaurants within a few minutes' walk

pedestrian_friendly.text: Some day-to-day needs are within walking distance

greenery.text: Very few street trees or parks in the area

cycling_friendly.text: Suitable for bicycle commuting and/or recreational cycling

car_friendly.text: Arteries nearby, but traffic congestion and parking problems are possible

vibrant.text: Vibrant atmosphere all day and into the evening

shopping.text: Wide variety of shops within a few minutes' walk

daycares.text: At least one daycare within a 5-minute walk

nightlife.text: Variety of bars within a few minutes' walk

cafes.text: Variety of cafés right on the street

parks.text: Very large amount of park space within a few minutes' walk
